[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3322334][img]https://i.imgur.com/rjaz79O.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Reputation Bumping has Been Disabled[/color][/b]
On October 30th [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] created a short thread in the Rules, Announcements, News and Feedback section announcing that reputation bumping has been completely disabled due to widespread abuse from members. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5745265]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Avatars Make a Return[/color][/b]
In a post on the [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5741402][b]HF Features Broken[/b][/url] thread [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] announced that upgraded members have the ability to upload either gif or static avatars once again. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5741402]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Laundry List of Future UI Fixes Posted[/color][/b]
On November 1st, [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] decided to create a thread, seperate from the one listing all the features broken on Hack Forums, to enumerate all the user interface upgrades he wants to do for the site. [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] isn't pleased with the current state of Hack Forums, and will work until these useability upgrades are completed. It seems that changes to the site following the MyBB 1.8x upgrade aren't close to being over.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5746227]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

An official list of features that are currently broken but will be fixed.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5746227][color=#FFFFFF][b]HF Theme UI Problems and Fixes[/b][/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
An official list of fixes that will be made regarding the new theme.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5745265][color=#FFFFFF][b]Rep Bump[/b][/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
Omniscient altered the reputation feature so that updated reputations are not bumped to the top.[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b][u]Informational Threads[/u][/b][/color]
[list][*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5287536][color=#FFFFFF][b]How To Get Started With Linux | A Beginner's Guide[/b][/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2440338][color=#FFFFFF][b]Sahaj[/b][/color][/url]

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5720978][color=#FFFFFF][b]Virtual Machines 101 | Ultimate Beginner Guide[/b][/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1999047][color=#FFFFFF][b]Vitani[/b][/color][/url]
The ultimate beginner guide for virtual machines.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5734031][color=#FFFFFF][b]Beginner's Guide to Social Networking | Social Media Help Desk[/b][/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1610871][color=#FFFFFF][b]Funtela[/b][/color][/url]

[list][*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5745201][color=#FFFFFF][b]Almost a year in.[/b][/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3427514][color=#FFFFFF][b]Ctrl+Alt+Del[/b][/color][/url]
